1.name: pink primrose
1.description: Pink primrose is a low-growing perennial known for its vibrant pink flowers that bloom in early spring. It prefers well-drained soil and partial shade.

2.name: hard-leaved pocket orchid
2.description: This orchid species features thick, leathery leaves and delicate white or pink flowers. It thrives in humid environments with indirect light.

3.name: canterbury bells
3.description: Canterbury bells are known for their tall spikes of bell-shaped flowers in various colors. They thrive in cool, well-drained soil.

4.name: sweet pea
4.description: Sweet pea produces fragrant, colorful flowers and prefers cool, well-drained soil.

6.description: Tiger lily features striking orange flowers with black spots and prefers sunny locations with well-drained soil.

7.description: Moon orchid is known for its delicate, fragrant flowers and needs warm temperatures and high humidity.
